hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Boomerang# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Silver Rupee Ladders Top

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Fish Bottle#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Silver Rupee Back Left

GC (Medigoron).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lava Room Silver Rupee Center Right

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Silver Rupee Wood Beam Back

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.
